title: Chapter 1646 - The Crescent Moon Pupil
body:
Chapter 1646 - The Crescent Moon Pupil

One slash, and he broke the Silvermoon Divine Wheel and sent Yin Beiwu flying!

This tyrannical strike stunned everyone present.

“What… What kind of Dao of the Sword is this?” 

Even the Immortal Kings were shaken. One slash rose into the sky, then seemed to overturn the heavens. There were no words to describe how terrifying it was.

Meanwhile, those in the demons’ camp were practically dumbfounded.

“That was the Silvermoon Divine Wheel. How could he break it so easily?”

Su Yi’s unstoppable slash came as an enormous shock to even Yin Xiaotian and the other Demon Kings. 

None of them would have guessed that in this clash between unrivaled geniuses, Yin Beiwu would be the first to be forced back.

Ten thousand feet away.

Yin Beiwu had only just steadied himself on his feet when he staggered once more. He couldn’t hold back any longer, and he hacked up a mouthful of blood.

His flexible armor had split in front, leaving a bloody gash in his chest so deep that his bones were visible!

There was no doubt about it. The flexible armor had blocked some of the impact of Su Yi’s strike. Without it, Yin Beiwu’s torso likely would have been...
